definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: In 2005, I graduated from the Department of Mechanical Engineering at South China University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 我于2005年毕业于华南理工大学机械工程系。

sentences.english: I want to say, I am very happy in MSTC of South China University of Science and Technology.
sentences.chinese: 我想说，在华南理工大学微软俱乐部，我是幸福的。

sentences.english: The lecture attracted many students of South China University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 讲座吸引了华南理工大学的莘莘学子，座无虚席。
